mainText:
I am simply a fan of Apple and, more importantly, Steve Jobs. His 
passing is a crushing blow to countless millions of people. His passion 
and creative genius made him more known, revered, and loved than many of 
today's celebrities. I just wish to send my condolences to all those who 
had the privilege of meeting, working, or sharing their lives with 
Steve. The world is rocking on its heels.
author: Connor
